name: PowerCenter:Filter Transformation Naming convention
description:
Filter Transformation name should begin with X. 
The prefix is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all Filter Transformations that does not respect the naming conventions. It provides the following information: Filter Transformation full name
rationale: For understandability and maintainability, naming conventions must be respected.
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
